meta.description: Optimize the number of plush toys and dolls to buy and sell to maximize profit.

sets.name: PRODUCTS
sets.description: Types of products sold in the toy store.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost to the store for each product.

vars.name: buy
vars.description: Number of each product to buy.

vars.name: sell
vars.description: Number of each product to sell.

objective.name: max_profit
objective.description: Maximize the total profit from selling plush toys and dolls.

constraints.name: budget_constraint
constraints.description: Total cost of buying products should not exceed the budget.

constraints.name: plush_toys_minimum
constraints.description: At least 90 plush toys should be sold.

constraints.name: plush_toys_maximum
constraints.description: At most 190 plush toys should be sold.

constraints.name: dolls_maximum
constraints.description: The number of dolls sold is at most twice the number of plush toys sold.
